mapper.sql: SELECT claim_no, claim_title, claim_content, claim_type, claim_file, user_id, user_emailID, user_emailDomain, user_phone1, user_phone2, user_phone3, to_char(claim_date, 'yy-mm-dd') as claim_date, claim_store, view_cnt, to_char(reg_at, 'yy-mm-dd') as reg_at FROM t_claim
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_claim(claim_no, claim_title, claim_content, claim_type, claim_file, user_id, user_emailID, user_emailDomain, user_phone1, user_phone2, user_phone3, claim_date, claim_store) VALUES(seq_t_claim_no.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, #{type}, #{file, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{writer}, #{emailID}, #{emailDomain}, #{phone1}, #{phone2}, #{phone3}, #{visitDate, jdbcType=DATE}, #{visitStore, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: where user_id = #{id} ORDER BY claim_no DESC
